name: SynthWave (Zeno)
description:
Controls
  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

  • Full Screen and Earphones for the Best Experience
  • Desktop Version for Better Performance

Description

"Synthwave" is a top-down shooter. For every level, there will be two different rooms, each filled with its own enemies. You will have to pick one of the sides to fight. Once you've killed all the enemies in that side, you move on to the next level.

A Word From The Author

The following game is made for Geo Jam with the theme "pick a side". This game is made in 3 days. Two external assets are used in this game.

  • Game Developer: Zeno
  • Game Engine: Godot
  • Font: BebasNeue
